message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_ENDDATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than the registration date.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_MAX_PAYMENT_RATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Maximum payment rate must be specified.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_MIN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_BLANK
message.locale: Minimum payment amount must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XFV_REGISTRATIONDATE_LARGE
message.locale: The Registration Date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_XFV_REG_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Utility registration date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_MAXIMUMPAYMENTRATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Maximum payment rate must be specified.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_MINIMUMPAYMENTAMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: Minimum payment amount must be specified.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_CONTACTNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A contact name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_METHODOFPMT_EMPTY
message.locale: Method of payment must be specified.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_XFV_PHONETYPE_NUMBER
message.locale: A phone number type must be specified when phone number is specified.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_XFV_PHONENUMBER_TYPE
message.locale: A phone number must be specified when a phone type is specified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEPHONE_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONETYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Phone details must contain both a phone number and a phone type.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONEAREACODE_EMPTY
message.locale: A phone area code must be entered.
